WorkItem.Description:
As a horde i can't choose this item, when i open it in Item Editor i see that the item is only for fraction Alliance.
 
But it drops also for hordes. I have solved the probs by changing the fraction to neutral. This error was also in ver 2.3.15 
(using 2.3.17 now)
 
Item can be found on my horde character Dumbeldore on EU-Lightning's blade realm
WorkItem.Summary: Arcane Loops of Anger Item id 50211

Comments.Message: It'll be correct for all future releases - thanks for letting us know.
